resources:
common Room home P Q R S > Post Query Resolve Sway> CommonRoom is a community based application for students to post their Queries, Discoveries, Doubts etc. with others as post.
This application also allows the features of any virtual discussion forum, where, students are encouraged to post comment/replies and click on agree/disagree button to present their point of view and opinions.
Developers behind the application: Priyanka Panda, MCA 41st batch, IGIT Omishan Upadhyay, MCA 41st batch, IGIT none Reply Agree Disagree Send user0001 Type here what you would like to post.... Forgot Password Log in Sign up Password User_ID Create Account
